skill_e.tooltip:
Unleash dark magic at a target position, dealing ? magic damage to and slowing enemies hit by ?% for ? seconds in a crescent shaped area.

Enemies in the center of the crescent are silenced for the duration as well as slowed.

skill_i.tooltip: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

skill_q.tooltip:
Passive: While unseen and out of combat or posing as an Effigy, damaging an enemy with a spell terrifies them for ? seconds.

Active: Terrifies a target for ? seconds and deals ?% (+1% per 50AP) of the target's current health (minimum ?) as magic damage.

If the target has recently been terrified, instead deal ?% (+2% per 50AP) of the target's current health (minimum ?) as magic damage.

Max 400 damage vs monsters.

skill_r.tooltip:
Channel for ? seconds, then blink to the target point unleashing a murder of crows, dealing ? (+?) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

The effect lasts for ? seconds, dealing up to ? (+?) total magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Drains the souls of nearby enemies, dealing ? magic damage per second over 2 seconds plus ?% of their missing health on the final instance of damage.

Fiddlesticks heals for ?% of the damage dealt before mitigation, reduced to ?% vs minions.

On a completed channel or if nothing remains to be harvested, refund 60% of the remaining cooldown.

Damage dealt to minions is reduced to ?%
